verses.verse: Therefore<WG1352> thou art<WG1488> inexcusable<WG379>, O<WG5599> man<WG444>, whosoever<WG3956> thou art that judgest<WG2919>: for<WG1063> wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> thou judgest<WG2919> another<WG2087>, thou condemnest<WG2632> thyself<WG4572>; for<WG1063> thou that judgest<WG2919> doest<WG4238> the same things<WG846>.
But<WG1161> we are sure<WG1492> that<WG3754> the judgment<WG2917> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> according<WG2596> to truth<WG225> against<WG1909> them which commit<WG4238> such things<WG5108>.

And<WG1161> thinkest thou<WG3049> this<WG5124>, O<WG5599> man<WG444>, that judgest<WG2919> them which do<WG4238> such things<WG5108>, and<WG2532> doest<WG4160> the same<WG846>, that<WG3754> thou<WG4771> shalt escape<WG1628> the judgment<WG2917> of God<WG2316>?

Or<WG2228> despisest thou<WG2706> the riches<WG4149> of his<WG846> goodness<WG5544> and<WG2532> forbearance<WG463> and<WG2532> longsuffering<WG3115>; not knowing<WG50> that<WG3754> the goodness<WG5543> of God<WG2316> leadeth<WG71> thee<WG4571> to<WG1519> repentance<WG3341>?

But<WG1161> after<WG2596> thy<WG4675> hardness<WG4643> and<WG2532> impenitent<WG279> heart<WG2588> treasurest up<WG2343> unto thyself<WG4572> wrath<WG3709> against<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of wrath<WG3709> and<WG2532> revelation<WG602> of the righteous judgment<WG1341> of God<WG2316>;
Who<WG3739> will render<WG591> to every man<WG1538> according<WG2596> to his<WG846> deeds<WG2041>:

To them who by<WG3303> <WG2596> patient continuance<WG5281> in well<WG18> doing<WG2041> seek<WG2212> for glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> honour<WG5092> and<WG2532> immortality<WG861>, eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>:

But<WG1161> unto them that are contentious<WG1537> <WG2052>, and<WG2532> do not obey<WG544> <WG3303> the truth<WG225>, but<WG1161> obey<WG3982> unrighteousness<WG93>, indignation<WG2372> and<WG2532> wrath<WG3709>,

Tribulation<WG2347> and<WG2532> anguish<WG4730>, upon<WG1909> every<WG3956> soul<WG5590> of man<WG444> that doeth<WG2716> evil<WG2556>, of the Jew<WG2453> first<WG4412>, and<WG5037> also<WG2532> of the Gentile<WG1672>; Gentile: Gr. Greek

But<WG1161> <WG2532> glory<WG1391>, honour<WG5092>, and<WG2532> peace<WG1515>, to every man<WG3956> that worketh<WG2038> good<WG18>, to the Jew<WG2453> first<WG4412>, and<WG5037> also<WG2532> to the Gentile<WG1672>: Gentile: Gr. Greek
For<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> respect of persons<WG4382> with<WG3844> God<WG2316>.

For<WG1063> as many as<WG3745> have sinned<WG264> without law<WG460> shall<WG622> also<WG2532> perish<WG622> without law<WG460>: and<WG2532> as many as<WG3745> have sinned<WG264> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551> shall be judged<WG2919> by<WG1223> the law<WG3551>;
(For<WG1063> not<WG3756> the hearers<WG202> of the law<WG3551> are just<WG1342> before<WG3844> God<WG2316>, but<WG235> the doers<WG4163> of the law<WG3551> shall be justified<WG1344>.

For<WG1063> when<WG3752> the Gentiles<WG1484>, which<WG3588> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> the law<WG3551>, do<WG4160> by nature<WG5449> the things<WG3588> contained in the law<WG3551>, these<WG3778>, having<WG2192> not<WG3361> the law<WG3551>, are<WG1526> a law<WG3551> unto themselves<WG1438>:

Which<WG3748> shew<WG1731> the work<WG2041> of the law<WG3551> written<WG1123> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588>, their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> also bearing witness<WG4828>, and<WG2532> their thoughts<WG3053> the mean while accusing<WG2723> or<WG2228> else<WG2532> excusing<WG626> one another<WG3342> <WG240>;) their conscience: or, the conscience witnessing with them the mean: or, between themselves
In<WG1722> the day<WG2250> when<WG3753> God<WG2316> shall judge<WG2919> the secrets<WG2927> of men<WG444> by<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> according<WG2596> to my<WG3450> gospel<WG2098>.
Behold<WG2396>, thou<WG4771> art called<WG2028> a Jew<WG2453>, and<WG2532> restest<WG1879> in the law<WG3551>, and<WG2532> makest thy boast<WG2744> of<WG1722> God<WG2316>,

And<WG2532> knowest<WG1097> his will<WG2307>, and<WG2532> approvest<WG1381> the things that are more excellent<WG1308>, being instructed<WG2727> out of<WG1537> the law<WG3551>; approvest: or, triest the things that differ
And<WG5037> art confident<WG3982> that thou thyself<WG4572> art<WG1511> a guide<WG3595> of the blind<WG5185>, a light<WG5457> of them which are in<WG1722> darkness<WG4655>,
An instructor<WG3810> of the foolish<WG878>, a teacher<WG1320> of babes<WG3516>, which hast<WG2192> the form<WG3446> of knowledge<WG1108> and<WG2532> of the truth<WG225> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551>.

Thou therefore<WG3767> which<WG3588> teachest<WG1321> another<WG2087>, teachest thou<WG1321> not<WG3756> thyself<WG4572>? thou that preachest<WG2784> a man should<WG2813> not<WG3361> steal<WG2813>, dost thou steal<WG2813>?
Thou that sayest<WG3004> a man should<WG3431> not<WG3361> commit adultery<WG3431>, dost thou commit adultery<WG3431>? thou that abhorrest<WG948> idols<WG1497>, dost thou commit sacrilege<WG2416>?
Thou<WG3739> that makest thy boast<WG2744> of<WG1722> the law<WG3551>, through<WG1223> breaking<WG3847> the law<WG3551> dishonourest thou<WG818> God<WG2316>?
For<WG1063> the name<WG3686> of God<WG2316> is blasphemed<WG987> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG1484> through<WG1223> you<WG5209>, as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>.

For<WG1063> circumcision<WG4061> verily<WG3303> profiteth<WG5623>, if<WG1437> thou keep<WG4238> the law<WG3551>: but<WG1161> if<WG1437> thou be<WG5600> a breaker<WG3848> of the law<WG3551>, thy<WG4675> circumcision<WG4061> is made<WG1096> uncircumcision<WG203>.

Therefore<WG3767> if<WG1437> the uncircumcision<WG203> keep<WG5442> the righteousness<WG1345> of the law<WG3551>, shall<WG3049> not<WG3780> his<WG846> uncircumcision<WG203> be counted<WG3049> for<WG1519> circumcision<WG4061>?

And<WG2532> shall not<WG2919> uncircumcision<WG203> which is by<WG1537> nature<WG5449>, if it fulfil<WG5055> the law<WG3551>, judge<WG2919> thee<WG4571>, who by<WG1223> the letter<WG1121> and<WG2532> circumcision<WG4061> dost transgress<WG3848> the law<WG3551>?

For<WG1063> he is<WG2076> not<WG3756> a Jew<WG2453>, which is one outwardly<WG1722> <WG5318>; neither<WG3761> is that circumcision<WG4061>, which is outward<WG1722> <WG5318> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561>:

But<WG235> he is a Jew<WG2453>, which is one inwardly<WG1722> <WG2927>; and<WG2532> circumcision<WG4061> is that of the heart<WG2588>, in<WG1722> the spirit<WG4151>, and not<WG3756> in the letter<WG1121>; whose<WG3739> praise<WG1868> is not<WG3756> of<WG1537> men<WG444>, but<WG235> of<WG1537> God<WG2316>.
